creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: one of two sake containers in the shape of a large drum with attached supports shaped like drum-stands; painted chrysanthemums on one side; another flowering plant on opposite side, with blossom on curving thin stem, and two smaller flowers on R and L; base of spout shaped like chrysanthemum
medium: Black lacquer with red lacquer painted designs
title: Sake containers with grasses and flowers
